content: {"name": "Catholic Charities of Southeast Michigan - All Saints Soup Kitchen and Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Various emergency assistance programs are offered. There is a free pantry for meat, dairy, and food items. A thrift store is open and a soup kitchen serves hot meals. There are also free personal hygiene and cleaning supplies, including detergent, soap, shampoo, and other items. They have free groceries and meals for the unemployed, immigrants and others in Detroit MI.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ccsem.org/allsaints/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6945 Wagner Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Claytown", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48210", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3390144, "longitude": -83.1359605}, "phones": [{"number": "(855) 882-2736", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
